itunes:summary:
Please welcome and subscribe to the new Drinkin' Bros spinoff show "Ross Patterson Revolution" podcast which will be dropping every Wednesday and Friday. Between Drinkin' Bros Podcast, Ross Patterson Revolution Podcast, and Blackhearted Podcast, we now have you covered every single day of the week!

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
